name: Jackpot Empire Slots
description:
Jackpot Empire Slots features an exciting New Slots Experience with Amazing Slot machines, Video & Classic Vegas Slots, Mega Bonuses, Pokies, Tournaments & Epic Jackpots with Huge Payouts, & a Social Casino Experience that lets you compete against other players in real time. Jackpot Empire Slots features Great Content and Amazing Graphics with an intuitive user interface that makes you feel like you are on the casino floor. Play Now!

Jackpot Empire has some incredible Unique Game Features. Players can design their own top ten favorite slot games for easy access, collect Gifts from Friends, Special & Daily Coin Bonuses and see exclusive offers all in one place, and there are Sneak Previews of new slot machines. There is even a hints section when you need some extra help. But don’t take our word for it, just download and play the Best Slots!

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at support@jackpotempireslots.com We love player feedback!

* This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for entertainment purposes only. All wins are virtual and not real money. You cannot withdraw your winnings.
* Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
* Please note that Jackpot Empire contains in-app purchases.
